name: A Dark Room - From Code Hobo to Indie Game Developer - CoRecursive Podcast
summary: Have you ever been frustrated with your job? Maybe not burnt out, but getting close to there? You used to love what you did, and it felt so creative and empowering, but then it starts to feel a bit more cookie cutter.Have you ever been frustrated with your whole life? The daily grind has taken what you love and it... [â€¦]
